survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Contactless Grocery Shopping Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather customer feedback on their experience with contactless grocery shopping services, focusing on ease of use, satisfaction, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How often do you use contactless grocery shopping services?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure the options cover all typical usage frequencies.

script.question_text: How often do you use contactless grocery shopping services?

questions.question_text: What features do you value most in contactless grocery shopping? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Ensure the options reflect common customer priorities.

script.question_text: What features do you value most in contactless grocery shopping? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall contactless grocery shopping experience?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for single-choice selection. Ensure the scale is balanced and clear.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall contactless grocery shopping experience?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for contactless grocery shopping services?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-ended text box to gather qualitative feedback. Encourage detailed responses.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for contactless grocery shopping services?

questions.question_text: Would you recommend contactless grocery shopping to others?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Keep options simple and clear.

script.question_text: Would you recommend contactless grocery shopping to others?
